name: Websockets webrtc
body:
# WebSockets_WebRTC

- This project is developed by Rustu Seyhun Sariyildiz.
- It's a video chat application implemented with chat rooms.
- It's only available for Chrome/Chromium with WebRTC support.
- 'node.js' is used with 'socket.io'
- The latest update of the project is deployed at http://www.html5cam.com

## Requirements

- node.js
- a HTTP server
- Chrome/Chromium with WebRTC support

# Credits

This project use the differents following projects :

- jQuery
- Fbootstrapp (http://ckrack.github.com/fbootstrapp/)

It's been inspired from : https://apprtc.appspot.com/
tagline: This project is an experimental project for learning WebSocket and WebRTC.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
